title: I can breathe
yesAnswer: Congratulations! No need to worry about your breathing.

title: I can taste my food
yesAnswer: Congratulations! No need to worry about your taste.

title: I know someone who has COVID-19.
yesAnswer: If you have been in contact with them within the past 2 weeks, please take a COVID-test and self-isolate.
noAnswer: You may not have caught the virus from them.

title: I went on a trip recently using a plane or a boat
yesAnswer: Make sure you self-isolate for 2 weeks and take a test if you get any other symptoms.
noAnswer: No need to worry about that.
